com.skysql.java

Class GsonLatestObservations

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skysql.java.GsonLatestObservations

  • public class GsonLatestObservations
extends java.lang.Object
    Handle the latest observations for all the Gson objects. Provides methods to save and retrieve the objects and the date when the current instance has last updated them. This is mainly useful to populate the If-Modified-Since header and increase efficiency.
    Author:
    Massimo Siani

    • Method Detail

      • getSystem

        public GsonSystem getSystem(int systemID)
        Get the object that corresponds to a system. The system of interest is specified by its ID.
        Parameters:
        systemID - the ID of the system to retrieve
        Returns:
        the Java object of the requested system, null if it doesn't exist

      • getNode

        public GsonNode getNode(int systemID,
               int nodeID)
        Get the object that corresponds to a node. The node is specified by the system ID the node belongs to, and the ID of the node itself.
        Parameters:
        systemID - the ID of the system the node belongs to
        nodeID - the ID of the node
        Returns:
        the object of the node, or null

      • getAllNodes

        public GsonNode getAllNodes(int systemID)
        Return the object that corresponds to a list of all known nodes that belong to a specified system.
        Parameters:
        systemID - the system id of the nodes
        Returns:
        the object of the nodes, or null

      • getMonitorClasses

        public GsonMonitorClasses getMonitorClasses(int monitorID)
        Get the object that corresponds to the monitor class with given monitor ID, if it has been cached.
        Parameters:
        monitorID - the monitor ID
        Returns:
        the object of the monitor, null if not found

      • getAllMonitorClasses

        public GsonMonitorClasses getAllMonitorClasses()
        Return the object that corresponds to a list of all known monitor classes.
        Returns:
        the object of the monitor classes, or null

      • getSystemUpdateDate

        public java.lang.String getSystemUpdateDate(int systemID)
        Get the last time that a system has been updated by this instance. The system is identified by its ID. If the ID does not exist or has not been saved yet, the date corresponding to the zero Unix time is returned.
        Parameters:
        systemID - the ID of the system
        Returns:
        the date when the system has been updated

      • getNodeUpdateDate

        public java.lang.String getNodeUpdateDate(int systemID,
                                 int nodeID)
        Get the last date when a node has been updated by the instance. If the ID of the system or of the node do not exist, or if the node does not belong to the given system, the date corresponding to the zero Unix time is returned
        Parameters:
        systemID - the ID of the system the node belongs to
        nodeID - the ID of the node
        Returns:
        the date of the node last update

      • getMonitorUpdateDate

        public java.lang.String getMonitorUpdateDate()
        Get the last time that the monitor list has been updated by this instance. If nothing has been saved yet, the date corresponding to the zero Unix time is returned.
        Returns:
        the date when the system has been updated

      • setLastSystem

        public void setLastSystem(GsonSystem systemObj)
        Save a system object. If the object contains a list of systems, each of them is saved separately with the current date.
        Parameters:
        systemObj - the object to save

      • setLastNode

        public void setLastNode(GsonNode nodeObj)
        Save a node object. If the object contains a list of nodes, each of them is saved separately with the current date.
        Parameters:
        nodeObj - the object to save

      • clearAllNodes

        public void clearAllNodes(int systemID)
        Remove all the cached data about a system.
        Parameters:
        systemID - the system ID

      • setLastMonitor

        public void setLastMonitor(GsonMonitorClasses monitorObj)
        Save all the monitors in the object and set the current time as the last monitor list update time.
        Parameters:
        monitorObj - the monitor class object
